meta.title: From PROFESSOR to FARMER
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: It's Blood on the Clocktower Week. ([See Day 1's note](https://raddle.quest/2025/05/19).) The [Farmer](https://wiki.bloodontheclocktower.com/Farmer) is one of the most powerful good characters in the game. Their only power is that when they die, another player turns into the Farmer. Which provides an immediate and mechanically confirmable chain of trust between two good players, a huge boon for the good team. In this case, the Storyteller chose the [Professor](https://wiki.bloodontheclocktower.com/Professor) to turn into the Farmer. The farm's a long way from academia, so here's hoping the Professor can hack it.

ladder.clue: Add a first name to <> to make a medical tool
In a certain alphabet, this first name is two before <>
Swap one letter in <> to get a part of the year
Remove a bigram (two letters) from <> to get something you might wear
Title that sounds like the first syllable of <>
A {} is often known as a "<>"
